Headline: Temporary #151 Sheridan Northbound Reroute near Washington between LaSalle-Clark
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Washington between LaSalle-Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, Washington and resume normal route due to street blockage near Washington between LaSalle-Clark.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harlem/Palestine
ShortDescription: EB 88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Devon, Northwest Highway and Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Palestine

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Devon, Northwest Highway and Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Palestine

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
